lenders.name: Maxim G
lenders.loan_because: I feel the urge to help the country of my birth, one of the poorest countries in the world.

lenders.name: Mabel
lenders.loan_because: I think the whole concept of Kiva encouraging people to reach across the world to connect with one another is truly an inspired idea.   That, and the fact that I get to see this picture of me with my beautiful new little godsonpup, Fella, every time I make a loan makes lending here particularly sweet.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm retired as a teacher but I love being with children so I still substitute at the inner-city elementary school near me where I used to teach full time.  I also teach piano and Sunday School.

lenders.name: Basaran Family
lenders.loan_because:
We have 2 beautiful children adopted from Peru.  I was blessed to be able to travel the country extensively in 2004, and experienced the warmth and dedication of the people trying to make a better life for their children.  We also saw a huge improvement in the daily lives of the people, having witnessed personally hyper-inflation and the Shining Path days in 1989.  

We are proud to give back to honour our children and their heritage.  The photo shows my daughter Maritza and I on a reed boat in Lake Titicaca in 2004.

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because: We are all people sharing the same planet and we should help each other to have happy and useful lives. I live in a country where we have everything we need but a lot do not so I want to share what I have to help others.
lenders.occupational_info: My husband and I live in a rural area and my husband is self employed. I do the books and also work full time for a large company.

lenders.name: Hannah
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: Thomas

lenders.occupational_info: My wife and I own a small plumbing business.  We help ensure our community has safe, clean water.

lenders.occupational_info: I work on computers to either fix them when they break or make them work better for people in my community.

lenders.name: Rusty
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I believe in helping others in need.  With over 2 billion people/families living off of just $2 a day we can make a difference in their lives really quick.  I plan to turn my business into a Kiva supporting operation.
lenders.occupational_info: I believe in helping others, not with just meeting their immediate needs but with a lasting effect so that they can eventually return the favor to someone else. lenders.occupational_info:
I own a small spa in Hong Kong which provides hand and feet spa services as well as threading, waxing and massage. We tidy people up and give them a place to relax and take a break from their busy city lives.  www.feelgoodfactor.com.hk

I also work for a small, independent, creative  branding and marketing agency where I concentrate on the overall development of the company and its people. In doing this, I handle new business enquiries, our marketing, the account servicing team and look for ways to grow the business and the fulfillment of the folks working in it. www.stepworks.com.hk

lenders.name: Jon
lenders.loan_because: The sad state of the distribution of wealth in this world. Just a few percent of this planets inhabitants owns most of the wealth, while many others live in poverty.

lenders.name: anna
lenders.loan_because: I try to leave this world a little better than I found it...

lenders.name: Kade
lenders.loan_because: Kiva connects me with people across the the world as well as helping me learn about foreign lifestyles, economic conditions, and creative business ideas. It also allows me to help people in need with money that would otherwise be stagnant.
lenders.occupational_info: When not in school I am busy mowing lawns and working at my local park, coaching youth sports. This allows me to save money and share it too.

lenders.name: Tara
lenders.loan_because: I'm so lucky to have what I do, and I want to share with others.

lenders.name: Pam

lenders.name: Tahnee
lenders.loan_because: I am so excited to be able to empower someone on the other side of the world to take control of their life and create their own wealth and happiness. I feel  honoured to be part of this wonderful website.
lenders.occupational_info:
In my Feldenkrais classes I help people learn how to move without pain, stiffness or effort. My students rediscover the joy of moving like a child!

I also run groups to inspire people to live in a more enviromentally sustainable, socially just and spiritually fulfilling way.

lenders.name: Angela
lenders.loan_because: Together with my friends in the CD group, we want to make a difference in people's lives by giving them the chance to help themselves.

lenders.name: Don
lenders.loan_because: I am interested in helping hard working people achieve their goals.
lenders.occupational_info: My role was to help senior leaders in my companies set and achieve their goals... all adding up to success for the company.

lenders.name: Sylvia
lenders.loan_because: I have a good life and I can affort a lot of things, like going on vacation, having a nice home, earning enought money. I have been in Cambodia at the beginning of this year and I saw a lot of poor people. With my loan I want to help some of the Cambodian people to improve their life and enjoy more from life. I want to give them some quality time in their life.
lenders.occupational_info: I work as a customer service representative at an American Company in the Netherlands.

lenders.name: Steve
lenders.loan_because: I am interesting in helping support other entrepreneurs, and understand the value the need for capital to do this. I also believe that small business owners can make a difference, and hope I can help a little towards building some successful projects.
lenders.occupational_info: I have built internet based community websites that generate revenue from advertising, and subscription revenues. I sell these websites to media companies, consumer brands, and digital agencies.

lenders.name: George
lenders.loan_because: It's a far better approach to help people  than "foreign aid" or the World Bank.

lenders.name: Ronnie

lenders.name: Rebecca
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people, help themselves to have a future.

lenders.name: Mike
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves an opportunity.

lenders.name: Vince
lenders.loan_because: I believe that owning a business allows one to be self-sufficient.

lenders.name: RICHARD
lenders.loan_because: I feel great when I see these people reach a goal in the task or the project they have set for themselves. When they get to their goal, I feel like cheering. The loan repayment just shows the success that these people are having and how gratifying it is to see the responsibility that these borrowers have shown. Some have been quite amazing in how quickly they have repaid their loans. I wish I could send them a letter of congratulations !

lenders.name: Michelle
lenders.loan_because: This is a great way to have a direct impact on people's lives.

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: If helping one or two people can ultimately help a community, then it's the right thing to do.

lenders.name: Quang Duc  TA

lenders.occupational_info: Give and you will receive in return...

lenders.name: Philip
lenders.loan_because:
I like to know my donations are going directly to help someone who is working to help themselves or those around them achieve success.
I was interested in MFI from the minute I heard of it years ago and have always lightly wondered how to become a part of it.  A news article in the Toronto Star recently directed me to Kiva.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a high school teacher in Canada, teaching history and law, with educational focus on the effects of imperialism around the world.

lenders.name: Nikki
lenders.loan_because: I want to put my money where my mouth is.  I tell my own kids and my students it's our responsibility to help out others less "lucky" in this world because I feel very lucky to have been born healthy, happy and Canadian.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach French as a second language to students in grade 8.  The last four loans made were with money raised by my wonderful grade 8s!

it makes a difference in so many lives.
pay it forward x 1000,

We loan because we can!

lenders.occupational_info: Retired from Corp. Communications

lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: Mary and Robert

lenders.name: a Free Mind supporter
lenders.loan_because:
NON SIA SOLO UNA FAVOLA!
«Durante un incendio nella foresta, mentre tutti gli animali fuggivano, un colibrì volava in senso contrario con una goccia d'acqua nel becco.
"Cosa credi di fare!" Gli chiese il leone.
"Vado a spegnere l'incendio!" Rispose il piccolo volatile.
"Con una goccia d'acqua?" Disse il leone con un sogghigno di irrisione.
Ed il colibrì, proseguendo il volo, rispose: "Io faccio la mia parte!".»

--

Avrei piacere di averti nel nostro team di finanziatori "Free Mind (Italia)" 

Unendoti al nostro team di finanziatori, possiamo lavorare insieme per alleviare la povertà. 

Facendo parte della squadra, hai l'opzione di contribuire con i tuoi prestiti su Kiva a formare l'impatto totale del nostro team. I prestiti rimangono tuoi - ed i rimborsi verranno accreditati direttamente a te - ma puoi anche scegliere che anche i tuoi prestiti vengano visualizzati in un portafoglio collettivo della nostra squadra "Free Mind (Italia)"!

Scopri la squadra http://www.kiva.org/team/FrMind?default_team=FrMind

Il sito é in inglese... puoi usare http://goo.gl/4vx2j per una traduzione google automatica in italiano.
lenders.occupational_info:
Sono vegan perché credo che le mie azioni hanno un senso. Sono vegan perché credo che un animale ha il diritto di vivere senza essere di proprietà di un altro. Sono vegan perché la pace, la giustizia e l'eguaglianza non possono esistere in un mondo che fa STRAGE di miliardi di esseri per la BANALE ragione che hanno un buon sapore. [Mac McDaniel]
✫(◠‿◠)✫
....__/\\__....
  и∂m∂§Tع'
I'm vegan because I believe that my actions have meaning. I'm vegan because I believe an animal has the right to live without being the property of another. I'm vegan because peace, justice, and equality cannot exist in a world that slaughters billions for the trivial reason that they taste good. [Mac McDaniel]
